root.name: Young Justice: Legacy
root.description: Overview"One will rise. One will fall. One will die."Set between seasons 1 and 2 of the animated television show, Young Justice: Legacy will feature many of the popular heroes and villains from the show and bridges the 5 five year gap between the seasons.StoryThe "Light" kidnaps the renown archaeologist Helena Sandsmark in an attempt to use her knowledge to locate fragments of an ancient statue of power. The team must come together and quickly rescue Dr. Sandsmark before it is too late!Game Playvs CheshireGameplay in Young Justice: Legacy will be similar to Marvel Ultimate Alliance, but instead of teams of four you will have teams of three (Similar to the team regularly splitting into Team Alpha, Beta, and Gamma). CharactersConfirmed Playable Heroes:AqualadArtemisBatgirl (Barbara Gordon)Beast BoyKid Flash (Wally West)Miss MartianNightwingRobin (Tim Drake)RocketSuperboyTempestZatannaConfirmed Villains:BaneBlack MantaBlockbusterCheshireIcicle JrKiller FrostKlarionLex LuthorPsimonRiddlerSportsmasterA twelfth main villain has yet to be revealed, but is said to be an important figure in Season 2.The creators hope to make 4 DLC characters available shortly after launch which were planned for the original release, but were dropped due to storyline issues. On October 27, 2013, the developers announced that the Wii and Wii U versions were canceled.
